name.hi,ja: 🍦 パパのスクープ。オリジナル - 甘い成功！
name.th: 🍦 ปาป้าสคูปส์ ของแท้ - ความสำเร็จที่หวานหวาน!
name.vi: Papa's Scoop. Ban nguyên bản - Thành công ngọt ngào!
name.zh_CN: 🍦 Papa's Scoop. 原创——甜蜜的成功！
name.zh_TW: 🍦糖果店Papa's Scoop。原始 - 甜蜜成功！

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Papa’s Scooperia Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Papa's Scooperia Original като разширение за Chrome - Можете да играете и без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Reproduiu Papa's Scooperia Original com una extensió de Chrome - També es pot jugar sense internet, proveu-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte Papa's Scooperia Original jako rozšíření Chrome - Také je možné hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to hned!
short.da: Spil Papa's Scooperia Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Du kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Juega Papa's Scooperia Original como una extensión de Chrome - Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.el: Juega Papa's Scooperia Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a internet, ¡pruébalo!
short.es: Juega Papa's Scooperia Original como una extensión de Chrome, también puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: العب بابا سكوبريا الأصلية كاملة كإضافة لمتصفح Google Chrome - يمكن أيضًا اللعب بدون اتصال بالإنترنت، جربها الآن!
short.fi: Pelaa Papa's Scooperia Originalia Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Papa's Scooperia Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin I-play nang hindi kailangan ng Internet, subukan mo…
short.fr: Jouez à Papa's Scooperia Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: Juega a Papa's Scooperia Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Jogue Papa's Scooperia Original como uma extensão do Chrome - Também é possível jogar sem internet, experimente agora!
short.hr: Igrajte Papa's Scooperia Original kao Chrome ekstenziju - Također možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játszd a Papa's Scooperia Originalt Chrome-bővítményként - Emellett internet nélkül is játszhatsz, próbáld ki most!
short.id: Mainkan Papa's Scooperia Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat dimainkan tanpa koneksi internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Jouez  Papa’s Scooperia Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.ja: クロームの拡張機能としてPapa's Scooperia Originalをプレイしてください。また、インターネットに接続しなくてもプレイすることができます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장프로그램으로 파파 스쿠페리아 오리지널을 플레이하세요 - 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite Papa’s Scooperia Original kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį - Be to, galite žaisti ir be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlēt Papa's Scooperia Original kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Var arī spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģini tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Papa’s Scooperia Original sebagai perluasan Chrome - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa koneksi internet, coba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Papa's Scooperia Original als een Chrome-extensie - Kan ook zonder internet spelen, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Papa's Scooperia Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.pl: Graj w oryginalną grę Papa’s Scooperia jako rozszerzenie do Chrome'a - Możesz też grać bez dostępu do Internetu, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Papa's Scooperia Original ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Papa's Scooperia Original как расширение для Chrome - также возможно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Hrajte Papa's Scooperia Original ako rozšírenie pre Chrome - Môžete si ju zahrať aj bez pripojenia na internet, vyskúšajte teraz!
short.sl: Play Papa’s Scooperia Original as a Chrome extension - Also, you can play without internet, try it now!
short.sr: Играјте Папина Скуперија Оригинал као Хром додатак - Такође можете играти без интернета, покушајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Papa's Scooperia Original som en Chrome-förlängning - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Papa's Scooperia Original เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Jouez à Papa’s Scooperia Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer hors ligne, essayez-le maintenant !
short.uk: Play Papa's Scooperia Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.vi: Chơi Papa's Scooperia Original như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 将Papa's Scooperia Original作为Chrome扩展程序进行游玩 - 同时也可离线游玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 以 Chrome 擴充功能方式玩 Papa's Scooperia Original - 無需網路也能遊玩，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🍦 Papa's Scoop. Original - Sweet Success! 🌟

Welcome to Papa's Scoop. Original, where sweet success is just a scoop away! Dive into the delightful world of ice cream mastery, crafting scrumptious treats and serving up smiles. Customize your creations, manage your scoop shop, and embark on a journey filled with endless sweetness. 🎉

🏆 Scoop to Success: Become the ultimate scoop master as you create mouthwatering ice cream delights. Craft custom sundaes that leave customers craving for more.

🍨 Customize Every Bite: Personalize your ice cream with a variety of flavors, toppings, and drizzles. From classic favorites to unique creations, the choices are as vast as your imagination.

🚀 Upgrade Your Scoop Shop: Elevate your business with smart upgrades. Invest in new equipment, trendy decorations, and unlock achievements as you transform your shop into an ice cream haven.

🌈 Seasonal Surprises: Celebrate the changing seasons with special treats and decorations. From summer sundaes to winter wonders, keep the excitement alive with limited-time events.

👩‍🍳 Meet Your Customers: Interact with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own preferences. Get to know your customers, serve them joyfully, and watch your loyal fanbase grow.

🎮 Mini-Games and Challenges: Take a break from scooping and enjoy engaging mini-games. Earn extra rewards and tackle challenges to keep the fun flowing.

🎶 Cheerful Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and cheerful atmosphere. From catchy tunes to delightful visuals, Papa's Scoop. Original creates an experience that's as joyful as the ice cream it serves.

Savor the sweet taste of success in Papa's Scoop. Original - where every scoop is a celebration, and your scoop shop is destined for greatness! Are you ready to embark on a journey of sugary delights? 🍦✨

Play more games on the top-left menu.
